mapper.insert:
SELECT sys_guid() FROM dual
insert into SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST(U_ID,U_USERNAME,U_PASSWORD,U_AVATAR,U_PHONE,U_EMAIL,U_REMARK,U_STATUS) values(#{userId},#{username},#{password},#{avatar},#{phone},#{email,jdbcType=CLOB},#{remark,jdbcType=CLOB},'1')

SELECT sys_guid() FROM dual
insert into SYS_AUTHZ_USER_DETAIL(U_ID,D_ID,D_GENDER,D_BIRTHDAY,D_IDCARD) values(#{userId},#{id},#{gender},#{birthday},#{idcard})
mapper.update: update SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION set R_ID = #{roleId} WHERE U_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.U_ID, t.U_USERNAME, t.U_ALIAS, '******' AS U_PASSWORD, '******' AS U_SALT, '******' AS U_SECRET, t.U_AVATAR, t.U_PHONE, t.U_EMAIL, t.U_REMARK, t.U_STATUS, t.U_TIME24, x.D_ID, x.D_BIRTHDAY, x.D_GENDER, x.D_IDCARD, y.R_ID FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST t INNER JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_USER_DETAIL x ON t.U_ID = x.U_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION y ON y.U_ID = t.U_ID WHERE t.U_ID = #{id}
SELECT t.R_ID AS name FROM SYS_AUTHZ_ROLE_LIST t INNER JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION x ON t.R_ID = x.R_ID WHERE x.U_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY x.R_PRTY ASC

SELECT DISTINCT y.PERMS FROM SYS_AUTHZ_ROLE_LIST t INNER JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION x ON t.R_ID = x.R_ID INNER JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_ROLE_PERMS y ON t.R_ID = y.R_ID WHERE x.U_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY x.R_PRTY ASC
